textAfterTable: Acupressure1,2 Holds specific points on meridians throughout the body that relate to specific areas of concern +$10. Angel/Intuitive1 Spoken guidance through intuition or from the angels to enhance healing and/or relaxation +$10. Foot Mask1 Application of massage oil or lotion on feet and wrapped with hot towels. +$10. Hot Stones1 Use of several hot stones to aid in releasing tight muscles. +$10. Hot Towels1 Placement of hot towels on the back during a massage. +$10. Neuropathy1 Protocol designed specifically to address tingling and numbness of the extremities +$20. Essential Oils3 Choice of 5 drops therapeutic grade essential oil included in session +$5. Reflexology Works with specific points on the hands and feet which correlate to other parts of the body +$10. Reiki/Energy Techniques used to pass on universal energy to client; may be hands-on or hands-off +$15. Ionic Foot Bath 8-minute foot bath where elements draw out toxins from the body +$15.
